      • updateIntegrityHMAC

        protected void updateIntegrityHMAC(java.io.File tmpFile,
                                   int oleStreamSize)
                            throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Generate an HMAC, as specified in [RFC2104], of the encrypted form of the data (message), which the DataIntegrity element will verify by using the Salt generated in step 2 as the key. Note that the entire EncryptedPackage stream (1), including the StreamSize field, MUST be used as the message. Encrypt the HMAC as in step 3 by using a blockKey byte array consisting of the following bytes: 0xa0, 0x67, 0x7f, 0x02, 0xb2, 0x2c, 0x84, and 0x33.(如[RFC2104]中指定的那样，生成数据（消息）加密形式的HMAC，DataIntegrality元素将通过使用步骤2中生成的Salt作为密钥来验证该HMAC。请注意，整个AccelertedPack流（1），包括StreamSize字段，必须用作消息。使用由以下字节组成的blockKey字节数组，如步骤3所示对HMAC进行加密：0xa 0、0x 67、0x 7 f、0x 02、0xb2、0x 2c、0x 84和0x 33。)
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException(java.security.GeneralSecurity例外)
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)
